comment.body: (I may also just be confused because the doc comment seems to be copied from the previous function without adjusting it to this one.)

Next step would be to remove the `JsonTermWriter`

comment.body:
I am likely missing something, but wouldn't it be simpler to just do

```rust
let mut paths = self.map.keys().collect::<Vec<_>>();
paths.sort_unstable_key();
paths
```

than to undo what `unordered_id_to_ordered_id` did?
